column4: it's quite possible that the theme you are using doesn'T have the specific emblems you were using,  you can copy them over from another theme,  it can be tedious,   the users icon theme are located in ~/.icons ,  I don'T recall where the defaults themes are located,  but something similar probably in /usr/share/icons or something ,  therer are two files for each emblems on the icon and a text file with the names in several langua
it's also possible that befroe you were just using a theme that contained some special folder icons for those folders
Yes, that is what I suspect too. Thank you for commenting. I will do some snooping based on your information.
if it is the second option,  special folder icons, you can always just put those back simply by right click properties  click the icons
